title: ASMR Beauty Treatment
description: ASMR Beauty Treatment is a game where you take on the role of esthetician at the ASMR clinic to help meet your clientâ€™s beauty needs. Get ready to scrape plaque, pop pimples and top off the beauty treatment with a head-to-toe outfit makeover. The game is fully guided so you can sit back, relax and enjoy the subtle sounds of transformation.
